commit_message:
docs(skills): update implementer skill for worktree integration

Refactor implementer SKILL.md to use worktree-based model:
- Replace .specks/runs/<session-id> with {worktree_path}/.specks/
- Add worktree_path to all agent Task invocations
- Add PR creation at end via committer-agent publish mode (Spec S04)
- Remove commit_policy manual/auto logic and Done/Abort prompts
- Fix modeâ†’operation field per Spec S04 contract
warnings: Manual policy: staged files only, awaiting user commit
